creator: nicolaken@apache.org
text: Simon Baker wrote: > Problem: > Retrieve a number of properties from a given XML file. > Some tags are repeated in the XML file, for instance: > > one > two > three > > The property 'b.a' in ant should be set to 'one,two,three' This patch does exactly this.

creator: paul@priorartisans.com
text: Please see bug 11321 for further enhancements to XmlProperty including this patch.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
This makes things easier, thanks Paul 8-)

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11321 ***
